rows.label: soul03_P0101
rows.name: Use melee attacks!

rows.label: soul03_P0102
rows.name: Step in and stagger them!

rows.label: soul03_P0103
rows.name:
Let's close in and make
this our fight!

rows.label: soul03_P0201
rows.name:
Wear them down
from a distance!

rows.label: soul03_P0202
rows.name: First, let's bolster our offense.

rows.label: soul03_P0203
rows.name:
Weaken them before
we move in!

rows.label: soul03_P0301
rows.name: Melee attacks next!

rows.label: soul03_P0302
rows.name: Give me some cover fire!

rows.label: soul03_P0303
rows.name: I'm going to make this quick!

rows.label: soul03_P0401
rows.name:
This is wearing me down.
I need healing!

rows.label: soul03_P0402
rows.name: I'm losing ground. Help me!

rows.label: soul03_P0403
rows.name: I can't let them overwhelm me!

rows.label: soul03_P0501
rows.name: I'm not going to make it!

rows.label: soul03_P0502
rows.name:
I'm in trouble...
I need to hold out!

rows.label: soul03_P0503
rows.name: I have to stay in this!

rows.label: soul03_P0601
rows.name:
Sorry, guys... Hit them while
they're still gloating...

rows.label: soul03_P0602
rows.name: I guess this is the end...

rows.label: soul03_P0603
rows.name: Did I give us a...fighting shot?

rows.label: soul03_P0701
rows.name: Good. Now get in there!

rows.label: soul03_P0702
rows.name:
Yes! Now follow with
some gunfire!

rows.label: soul03_P0703
rows.name: Perfect! Now weaken them!

rows.label: soul03_P0801
rows.name:
Got it! Swing around and
get the drop on them!

rows.label: soul03_P0802
rows.name:
Now, if we can just topple
them with gunfire...!

rows.label: soul03_P0803
rows.name:
Yes! Now weaken them and
finish this!

rows.label: soul03_P0901
rows.name:
They're a big target.
Just concentrate your fire!

rows.label: soul03_P0902
rows.name:
They're larger than us. Buff up
and play it safe!

rows.label: soul03_P0903
rows.name:
We can take this behemoth
down if we attack together!

rows.label: soul03_P1001
rows.name:
We're in a good position!
Move in!

rows.label: soul03_P1002
rows.name: There! Now open fire!

rows.label: soul03_P1003
rows.name:
I caught them off guard. Weaken
them while we've got the chance!

rows.label: soul03_P1101
rows.name: Don't give them a chance to rest!

rows.label: soul03_P1102
rows.name: We need to catch our breath!

rows.label: soul03_P1103
rows.name:
Okay, gather your power
and get ready!

rows.label: soul03_P1201
rows.name: Follow me! No quarter!

rows.label: soul03_P1202
rows.name:
Overclock! Let's push
them back!

rows.label: soul03_P1203
rows.name: Let's tighten up the teamwork!

rows.label: soul03_C0101
rows.name: Step in and drive them back!

rows.label: soul03_C0102
rows.name: There! Target another one!

rows.label: soul03_C0103
rows.name: Next! Buff me up!

rows.label: soul03_C0201
rows.name:
They're easy to read
if you focus!

rows.label: soul03_C0202
rows.name: Pay attention to their moves!

rows.label: soul03_C0203
rows.name: Now! Strike like lightning!

rows.label: soul03_C0301
rows.name:
Such technical brilliance...
Now it's your turn!

rows.label: soul03_C0302
rows.name:
Yes! Now savage them
with some gunfire!

rows.label: soul03_C0303
rows.name:
Okay, good.
Now close in and strike!

rows.label: soul03_C0401
rows.name: Beware the weather!

rows.label: soul03_C0402
rows.name:
I don't like these conditions,
but we know how to adapt!

rows.label: soul03_C0403
rows.name:
Use the weather to
your advantage!

rows.label: soul03_C0501
rows.name:
Let's get ourselves in
shape while we can!

rows.label: soul03_C0502
rows.name: New formation!

rows.label: soul03_C0503
rows.name:
A little teamwork should
stir them up!

rows.label: soul03_C0601
rows.name: Thanks for the backup!

rows.label: soul03_C0602
rows.name: I appreciate the help.

rows.label: soul03_C0603
rows.name: Use this to hold the line!

rows.label: soul03_C0701
rows.name:
Let's gain control
of this situation.

rows.label: soul03_C0702
rows.name:
Thank you. Now we can
focus on offense.

rows.label: soul03_C0703
rows.name: No rest for the wicked!

rows.label: soul03_C0801
rows.name:
Sometimes you have to
be reckless! Close in!

rows.label: soul03_C0802
rows.name:
Keep firing! We'll find a way
out of this mess...

rows.label: soul03_C0803
rows.name: Backup, please!

rows.label: soul03_C0901
rows.name:
I'll distract them while you
blast them!

rows.label: soul03_C0902
rows.name: I need cover fire!

rows.label: soul03_C0903
rows.name: Now! Concentrate your fire!

rows.label: soul03_C1001
rows.name: Go go go! Move in!

rows.label: soul03_C1002
rows.name: Down you go! Open fire!

rows.label: soul03_C1003
rows.name: Cripple them now!

rows.label: soul03_C1101
rows.name:
All right, I shut 'em down.
Strike now!

rows.label: soul03_C1102
rows.name: That should stop them. Fire!

rows.label: soul03_C1103
rows.name:
They're not moving.
Weaken them now!

rows.label: soul03_C1201
rows.name:
Let's wake this sleepyhead
up the hard way!

rows.label: soul03_C1202
rows.name:
A shame we have to ruin their
beauty sleep!

rows.label: soul03_C1203
rows.name: Ever wake up in a HOT sweat?

rows.label: soul03_C1301
rows.name: I'll hold them! No mercy!

rows.label: soul03_C1302
rows.name: They're helpless! Open fire!

rows.label: soul03_C1303
rows.name:
There! Close in and
help me hold them!

rows.label: soul03_C1401
rows.name:
Appendage damage?
Hold together, damn you!

rows.label: soul03_C1402
rows.name:
What?! Well at least
they're distracted!

rows.label: soul03_C1403
rows.name: Dammit! I need cover fire!

rows.label: soul03_C1501
rows.name:
No! This is no time
to scrap my Doll!

rows.label: soul03_C1502
rows.name:
I can handle this
without my Doll!

rows.label: soul03_C1503
rows.name:
Guess I'll just have to
turn this around!

rows.label: soul03_C1601
rows.name: Low fuel! I'll try to conserve!

rows.label: soul03_C1602
rows.name:
I can't afford to run out of
fuel now...

rows.label: soul03_C1603
rows.name:
My Doll's guzzling fuel...
Can we turn this around?
